title: [Yegharren Plain, Grasslands]
description: A sea of tall grass surrounds the hunting path on all sides, occasionally rustling with the passing of some large unseen creature.  The breeze carries a scent of cool night air and drying grass, and occasionally a more ominous odor of something lying dead nearby.

A sea of tall grass surrounds the hunting path on all sides, occasionally rustling with the passing of some large unseen creature.  The breeze carries a scent of sun and drying grass, and occasionally a more ominous odor of something lying dead nearby.
